message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your offer, but I believe $120 is still a fair price for this product. Would you be willing to consider this amount?
